remarks: 2-variable restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1999.)
statement:
rspc2v.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rspc2v.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
rspc2ev $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D /\ ps ) -> E. x e. C E. y e. D ph ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps y $.
